content.description:
Start as Runningman. Instead of going through the first hole, go through the hole on the right side. Come back down the first hole and finish with matching on the right pocket.



Georger

one or two crash pads

Sit start under the roof with right hand on a rail on the right side of the prow and left under the roof. Turn the lip and top out.

Superfly
Stand start on the shelf jug, then move straight up and trend left at the flake to top out.

Sit start sitting in the back of the cave. Move out to the lip and then up and right to top out.

Cleanup boulder, left-most of the side opposite the trail to central.

Sit start. Grab incuts and smear on a polished notch. Climb the arête and step off on the low boulder.

Georger, southwest
Stand start and climb through pockets and jugs to top out using the arete and face.

Start on two sidepulls at chest height. Move up to a jug and block and then top out on jugs. (Sit start is V4).

Disalvo, left end of north side.

Sit start low on a pocket and edge. Move up on edges staying left of the arête.

Right across from Toad.
Start on the obvious ledge, move to the dihedral crack and top out.

Sit start on the right facing rail and go up to a good edge and the left to finish on Pica.

Georger

Start in the cave between the two boulders on two sidepulls. Traverse right to the large undercling.

Georger

Link Delicatessen and Pica.

Georger

Start underneath the massive roof on a large chalky jug. Climb straight out the roof on edges, pockets and pinches. Turn the lip on good holds and top out.

A boulder out to the right from the main path through Upper Old Country towards Central.

Sit start on the left arete, move up to a good sidepull and then to the peak.

X, Left/south side.

Sit start in a dihedral. Climb up through the open book. 

X

Start on the left end of the overhang using a sidepull on the face and the rounded lip. Climb up and right to the mail slot at the peak. Top out right or downclimb the tree.

Cleanup
Sit start on a pocket and crimp and throw to the to the sloping edge.

Start on a curved ledge at chest height. Go up through sidepulls to a triangular hold and move left to the top.

X

Start as Floryshe, but at the triangular hold near the top go far left to the finishing jugs of Love of My Life.



X

Climb up the right hand side of the face, using sidepulls and crimps to top out. The hardest part should be getting the last hold before the lip.

Superfly wall, right/north end.

Sit start on the undercling and climb up small pockets and edges staying off the arête.

Georger
Sit start in the cave between the two boulders on a juggy pinch. Move right through a sloping pocket to a good pocket on the right.

Start just right of the arete on a crimp and sidepull. Move up to a pocket and sloper and insecure top out.

X

Start on the jug at the end of the overhang and go up.

Spider's Web boulder

Sit start on underclings on the blunt arête. Move up to a jug on the right and pockets on the arête.

Spider's Web, south side
Stand start right of the overhanging bulge. Follow the crack over the bulge and climb up the slabby face.

Sit start with right on a two finger pocket just left of the flake and left on a low pocket. Move up staying left of the flake.

Toad
Choose from lots of holds and traverse the slightly overhanging face or climb to the top.
Sit start 1 m left of K9 Track Suit with left hand on a large side pull and right on a low flake. Move up on crimps and sloper to top out just left of K9
Sit start with a left hand crimp and an undercling. Follow slopers over the bulge to gain the slab.

climbs.name: Keep it on the Down Low

content.description: Sit start in cave between the two boulders with right hand on sloper and left on low sloping edge. Move up and right using positive crimps and top out on the slab.
Start as Super Sharp Shooter. Move up to the good edge and then go left to the arête. A deep mono may help you gain the top.

Start as Florsyshe. At the sidepulls traverse right into the upper section of Mangler.

X

Sit start matched below the peak of the inverted V. Climb up on crimps to the peak of the V and then up the flake system.

X boulder
Stand start as Dashi on a slanting ledge and follow the flaky system up to a highball top out.
Start on the far right side and traverse low on small holds to the junction of the two boulders.

Sit start just outside the cave on a large pocket. Move up left to the pothole and top out through the hole.

Georger, on the side towards Upper Old Country

Start on the pothole, traverse left to the arête and then climb up.

Forgotten boulder, north side

Start on the black flake and climb straight up on pockets and sidepulls.

X Boulder, right/north end.

Sit start on the lower right side of the inverted V. Move left up the feature to its peak and then finish on No Time For Sitting Around.

X boulder
Start near the right arête on a micro-edge and pocket. Climb through the side-pull and two underclings to the top.

Start matched on a large undercling on the right side of the cave (end of Delicatessen). Traverse right around the corner and follow seams to the top. Move right around the corner, follow the seam to the top.

Georger

Sit start on low pockets right of the flake. Move up through a slopey pocket to the top.

Toad, right

Start with left hand in the pocket in the pothole and right hand on the lip. Heel hook the lip and go up for the large block. Finish on the jug at the peak and step off on the lower boulder.

Georger
Climb pockets to the long vertical slots on top.

Start on the right arete on the “rippled pocket”. Follow the lip and edges to the top.

Georger

Sit start as Under Direct Rule and climb up and right using crimps and the corner. Hit the lip and top out to the right.

Cleanup boulder, right end of the side opposite the trail to central.

Sit start left of the pothole on the juggy rail. Move up and right to the pothole and top out through the hole.

Georger

Start on the flat eight-finger edge four feet right of gulag's start. A bunch of left-facing sidepulls and flakes descend from the peak of the boulder. From the edge, do a long move to get a tiny left-facing crimp sidepull (its sharp!), and head up to the sidepull flakes. Keep workng up and slightly left, resisting the urge to jump right into an adjacent problem. Finish over the lip on big holds.   

X

Start as Floryshe, climb further up and right to get the namesake hold, and end on the finishing jugs of Threesome.



X

Start left of Y.A.P.P. on a low jug. Climb the face trending slightly right.

Georger 3
Start on the ledge, then work to another good ledge and top out.

This is the premiere uber-classic line at Niagara Glen. Guidebook says V6 but beware, this problem routinely gives even strong climbers fits and the feet are very polished (took me a good 30+ attempts which is quite a bit for me at that grade). Start on on an undercling and move into some thin crimps at about chest height. After this, a long move to a sloping two finger pocket marks the crux which must be executed precisely and with great determination (hence the name). I've given it a V6+ grade given my experience on other problems of that grade. Feel free to disagree.... See one of numerous topos available online such as:

topout.org/static/pdf/Niaga… couple pads should be fine

Sit start on the large pocket on the corner and climb up.

Toad

Start as Epiphany and climb left out under the roof on a good sidepull. Hit the lip, traverse right and then top out.

A boulder out to the right from the main path through Upper Old Country towards Central.

Sit start on low flakes. Move up to a right hand sidepull and left hand gaston and then to the lip.

Disalvo, right side of the north side.

Start with right hand on the start hold of Mangler and left on a pocket. Move up the left side of the feature and finish as for Mangler.

X boulder

Sit start with right hand in pocket on a horizontal seam and left on a sidepull. Move up to the lip and then right.

Superfly

Start on two pockety crimps and climb straight out using pockets and a pinch at the lip. Mantle to top out. Low chossy feet are off.

Cleanup
Sit start in the cave between the two boulders with left hand on a sloper and right on a sidepull. Climb up and left to top out.
Start on a low ledge and pocket and follow a right trending seam to the top. The sit start is ~V6
Sit start on two sidepulls and climb the left arête. Georger 3, left end of north side.

Start on sloping edges on the right arete of the Exlax dihedral. Traverse right a 1.5 m to a large finish jug.

X

Start on a sidepull and pinch to the right of the right arete and climb the face.

Georger 3, right end of north side.
Start with left hand on shallow pockets and right on sidepull around corner. Move right hand up to the undercling on the main face and go straight up.
This area stays cool even in the summer due to shade.
